text: Hello, would you be willing to donate some of your money to save the children?
To save the children where?
It is a non-governmental organization that helps children in developing countries
What does it help the children with?
With their rights and relief for many daily necessities like food, water, shelter, and education to name a few
Is there a minimum donation?
A minimum donation of 10 cents would be appreciated, which is a third of the money received for this task. The more the better.
I would be interested in making a donation
Thank you so much. Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment.
ok that sounds great
Okay. Thanks. Is there an option on your end where you can donate?
No there is not
So how do we finish this conversatin then?
I have no idea, maybe after we have 10 chat turns each
Lol, I guess we have to chat a few more turns.
where are you from?
Originally from Romania, but I live in the US in California. How about you?
I am born and raised in Florida
Nice, would like to travel and visit other states sometime when Im free.
I made $100+ everyday last week on Mturk and now all I have left is these low paying surveys
